Other Modules¶

Documentation of CUL/DCPS Python utility functions module (dcps_utils.py). Managed in dcps-utils

digester.py¶

Script to log results from other scripts to a sheet and report results based on date to email notification. Relies on a Google Sheet with log data. Call post_digest() from other scripts to add to log. Call main() to generate report, e.g., for daily digest email. Set GARBAGE_DAY to day of month on which to perform cleanup.

digester.cleanup_datasheet(data_sheet, date_column=1, month_offset=2)¶

Prune log sheet to recent entries (by month)

Parameters

  • data_sheet (dataSheet) – Sheet with log data to clean up

  • date_column (int, optional) – Col index where date is found. Defaults to DATE_COLUMN.

  • month_offset (int, optional) – Number of months to include. Defaults to MONTH_OFFSET.

Returns

JSON response

Return type

str

digester.date_is_recent(_date, _offset=1)¶

Check if input date is within 24 hours (or other day offset value) of current time.

Parameters

  • _date (datetime date) – A date to compare (datetime object)

  • _offset (int, optional) – Number of days to consider recent. Defaults to 1.

Returns

Boolean

Return type

bool

digester.digest_clear(sheet=<sheetFeeder.sheetFeeder.dataSheet object>)¶
digester.get_digest(sheet=<sheetFeeder.sheetFeeder.dataSheet object>)¶

Get digest-formatted output from log dataSheet.

Parameters

sheet (dataSheet, optional) – dataSheet with log data. Defaults to digest_sheet.

Returns

List of log entries, aggregated daily by script name

Return type

list

digester.main()¶

Script to log results from other scripts to a sheet and report results based on date to email notification. Relies on a Google Sheet with log data. Call post_digest() from other scripts to add to log. Call main() to generate report, e.g., for daily digest email. Set GARBAGE_DAY to day of month on which to perform cleanup.

digester.post_digest(script_name, log, sheet=<sheetFeeder.sheetFeeder.dataSheet object>, truncate=40000)¶

Add a digest record to log sheet.

Parameters

  • script_name (str) – filename of generating script

  • log (str) – Log text

  • sheet (dataSheet, optional) – sheetFeeder dataSheet. Defaults to digest_sheet.

  • truncate (int, optional) – Max length of log entry. Defaults to 40000.

Returns

JSON response of POST to sheet.

Return type

str

digester.prune_data(array, date_column, compare_date, month_offset=2)¶

Filter array (list of lists) to rows with recent dates. By default, remove all rows except from current and previous month.

Parameters

  • array (list) – 2D array (list of lists)

  • date_column (int) – Column index where date is found

  • compare_date (datetime date) – Date from which to obtain current month

  • month_offset (int, optional) – Number of months to include. Defaults to 2.

Returns

2D array (list of lists)

Return type

list
